attacks.name: Power Whip
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage for each basic Energy card attached to Tangrowth to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Stick and Absorb
attacks.effect: Remove 3 damage counters from Tangrowth. The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
